overview:
Adrian is the co-founder and head of marketing at SkillSlate.com.

Adrian started his career in Cambridge, MA, with Monitor Group where he helped companies across a number of industries tackle their strategic problems. As he gained experience, Adrian narrowed his focus to marketing strategies for digital media companies. Case examples include a pricing and product strategy for a major music record label and a comprehensive marketing strategy for one of the U.S.’s largest cable companies.

Adrian then transferred to Monitor’s Saudi Arabian office where he worked with the Saudi Arabian General Investment Authority to make the Kingdom a more competitive economy. His projects included building Saudi Arabia’s first tech meetup for entrepreneurs and VC’s, helping drive the Saudi Fast Growth 100 (a list of the Kingdom’s fastest growing startups), and managing content and speaker engagement for the Global Competitive Forum, which included speeches from Tony Blair, Michael Dell, and Jeff Immelt.
